title: Ticket #6912: Check for E_NO_PERM-equivalent nvidia-ml error.
description: condor_gpu_utilization now uses a number of _v2 functions. These functions' characteristic difference from the original versions is that they will report on all devices in a system, even if the caller doesn't have permission for them; we don't currently handle this case, and should.
remarks:
2019-Mar-19 18:10:33 by tlmiller:
Pretty sure this won't need documentation. (Internal changes to previously unreleased code.)

2019-Mar-26 16:26:48 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW : looks good
check_ins: 2019-Feb-14 10:55   Check-in [56182]: (#6912) Ignore devices we don't have permission to monitor rather than failing. (By Todd L Miller )
